caption.body: "Waiting" by Larry Sultan and Mike Mandel is a large-scale photographic close-up of four central figures involved in the familiar yet deeply symbolic drama of waiting in an airport for the return of loved ones. The photograph, taken by the artists, was translated into a digital image with each pixel represented by a one inch mosaic tile.  See "Waiting" by Larry Sultan and Mike Mandel, located, post-security, in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/2nplAyR
